description: Example plugin that shows all of the options for paramSchema

paramSchema.title: String Type
paramSchema.name: string
paramSchema.description: A simple text field. Can have a default value and be required.

paramSchema.title: Password Type
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: A simple text field that obsecures the text.

paramSchema.title: Boolean Type
paramSchema.name: boolean
paramSchema.description: A checkbox field. Can have a default value and be required

paramSchema.title: Enum Type
paramSchema.name: enum
paramSchema.description: A dropdown list of enumerated values. Can have a default and be required
